downbeat.translation[0].definitions[0].d: not showing any strong feelings, especially not happy ones
downbeat.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Al was surprisingly downbeat about the party.
downbeat.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the first note in a bar of music
downbeat.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the movement a conductor makes to show when this note is to be played or sung
